name: Block Universe (ticsoft)
description:
BUILD

Build anything you want! Explore new items to create your planet!

TRADE

Trade your items with Universan over the world with trading system!

FARM

Build blocks, furnitures, wallpapers, etc! Fuse them to combine into new items!

PLAY

Compete in planets created by Universan, or create your own planet for other players to enjoy with! Communicate with them and have fun!

--

HOW TO PLAY
To move: A(left), D(right) or use arrowkeys
To jump: W
To chat: Press enter or chat bubble icon
To punch: Use mouse to aim
